name: Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel - Hydrating Under Eye Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine - Target Dark Circles and Puffiness - Skin Care for Face
short_description: BRIGHT AND BEAUTIFUL: Rejuvenate and energize your eyes for a bright fresh look. Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Wake Up Eye Gel formulated with a combination of powerful ingredients to help you look your best.

GOODBYE PUFFY, TIRED EYES: Notice the difference! This nutrient-packed eye gel works to reinvigorate your eyes! Designed to reduce the signs of tired eyes, puffiness, and dark circles while also hydrating and plumping the skin to reduce the appearance of fine lines.

POTENT FORMULA, POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Antioxidant-rich, sustainably sourced Yerba Mate works to protect and nourish the skin around your eyes. While caffeine and acetyl tetrapeptide-5 encourage a reduction in swelling and hyaluronic acid helps to plump and firm!

PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense a pea-sized amount and pat around the eye area with your ring finger. Gently massage into the eye contour until fully absorbed avoiding direct contact with your eyes. Can be used in the morning or at night.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this gel is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 5.2 and is vegan, fragrance-free, and cruelty-free.

Visibly brighten and depuff eyes in 4 weeks plus reduce appearance of fine lines by 50 percent in 12 weeks
ANTI-AGING FORMULAS: Whether you're looking for a solution for deep wrinkles, fine lines, dark circles, crow's feet, uneven skin tone or dry skin, we have an anti-aging formula that's right for you.

product_description: Specially formulated for the delicate eye area, it visibly reduces wrinkles around the eyes and crow's feet in 12 weeks. In addition, it evens out dark circles and reduces puffiness in 4 weeks. Product is Non-comedogenic and dermatologist tested. Retinol is a retinoid, a derivative of vitamin A that naturally occurs in skin. Our exclusive formula accelerates the removal of old, dull skin cells on the surface revealing fresh, new ones. The result is vibrant and healthier-looking skin.

This non-sticky, non-greasy under eye cream for puffiness and bags, quickly absorbs into the skin and can be worn alone or under makeup. This eye cream for men & women is suitable for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers. It is recommended to use this product twice daily.

name: VELAMO ADVANCED Retinol Eye Stick: Renewing & Firming Under Eye Balm for Dark Circles, Puffiness, Fine Lines & Wrinkles - Travel Essentials, Portable & Perfect for On-the-go Use, 0.1 OZ/3g
short_description: Retinol Eye Cream Stick for Wrinkles & Fine Lines: Our retinol-powered under eye balm stick is formulated to visibly smooth fine lines, crow’s feet, and wrinkles. It helps renew skin texture and improve elasticity—perfect for evening use to repair and rejuvenate the delicate eye area while you sleep.

Dual-Action Age Defying Complex: Enriched with Retinol and Bakuchiol (a natural plant-based alternative), this retinol eye stick helps deliver the appearance of anti-aging results while remaining gentle on the skin. Combined with Squalane and Royal Jelly, it hydrates and plumps the skin while reducing the appearance of dark circles and puffiness.

Mess-Free & Easy Application: No fuss, no mess. Simply glide the stick gently under the eyes. For beginners, we recommend using once every 2-3 days initially to allow your skin to adjust, gradually increasing to once daily. While optimized for nightly repair, it can be used in the morning—just ensure to follow with a broad-spectrum SPF. Perfectly sized, this solid, non-liquid formula is a TSA-compliant travel size toiletry, making it an airplane travel essential for maintaining your routine high above the clouds or during layovers. True to VELAMO ADVANCED’s "Beauty With Ease".

Botanical Moisture & Antioxidant Complex: Infused with Fullerenes, Astaxanthin, and Meadowfoam Seed Oil, providing targeted antioxidant protection and deep nourishment. This blend, featuring Resurrection Plant and Ginger Root Extract, helps the skin recover from daily environmental stressors for a refreshed look.

Gentle & Safe: Dermatologist-tested. Safe for sensitive skin and suitable for those incorporating retinol into their routine. Pair with our Caffeine Eye Stick for morning use to form a complete morning-and-night eye care routine. Apply our retinol eye cream as part of your nightly ritual to target signs of aging for your relaxed home routine.

Satisfaction Guaranteed Policy: We care about our customers and stand for every sold retinol eye cream stick! If you are not fully satisfied with the results, contact us for a hassle-free refund, no questions asked, no return needed - Your happiness is our ultimate goal!

name: Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream for Dark Circles, Wrinkles and Puffiness, 13 ml (0.4 fl. oz.)
short_description: ALL-IN-ONE EYE CARE: Ultimate younger-looking eye cream that fights wrinkles, puffy eyes and dark circles
RICH FORMULA: Opaque, pink & smooth to the skin, this fragrance-free cream is formulated with a hint of concealer that blends seamlessly with all skin tones
INGREDIENTS THAT RENEW: Revive your eyes with ingredients like B3, Peptides & Pigments that work together to fortify skin's natural moisture & instantly reduce signs of tiring days & nights
HYDRATION: Combat wrinkles, dark circles & tired-looking eyes morning & night by placing a small amount around the eye area & smoothing until absorbed
INSTANT EYE-OPENER: Hydrates & restores eyes from the very first use & contains OLAY's color-correcting technology to blend with all skin tones
SKIN CARE INDUSTRY LEADER: OLAY Ultimate Eye Cream beats the competition, hydrating better than $100, $200 & even $400 eye creams
product_description: We've specifically formulated OLAY Ultimate Eye Cream to treat the delicate eye area. Fight long days and even longer nights with this 3-in-1 de-circler, de-wrinkler, and de-puffer. Our eye cream instantly brightens the eye area and reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, puffy eyes, and dark circles. Supercharged with peptides and vitamins, it hydrates and renews skin's surface helping your skin look smoother and firmer. Plus, Olay's color-correcting technology acts as a touch of concealer that matches all skin tones. Olay Eye Cream is specifically formulated with three main ingredients: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Keeps skin seriously hydrated by retaining moisture. It also helps with surface skin cell regeneration and exfoliates to remove dull skin.​Peptides: The building blocks of skin cells help skin look smoother and firmer.​Pigments: Act as a touch of concealer and are ideal for all skin tones. Plus, they don't easily bleed or smear so you don't have to keep reapplying.​How to Use:​1. Cleanse your skin to remove dirt, oil, or makeup such as Regenerist face wash​2. Place a small amount of OLAY Ultimate Eye Cream morning and night around the eye area and gently massage it in until absorbed. ​3. Use your favorite OLAY face moisturizer for daytime such as Hyaluronic + Peptide 24 and follow up with Olay Retinol 24 for nighttime use.​At Olay, we're serious about our commitments. Our Olay Skin Promise to you is zero skin retouching in all advertising. OLAY is the first mass skin care brand in the U.S. to take this stance because we know real beauty is honestly beautiful. We also guarantee you'll love your Olay product. If you are not satisfied, we'll give you your money back via a prepaid card. Must submit within 60 days of purchase. Call toll-free 1-855-845-9797 or visit Visit Olay website/guarantee.​
